channel.title: How can i make npcs give skill cape
channel.description: I was wondering, I added a npc and I was wondering if I could make it so you talk to him, and he will give you all the skil capes you have a 99 in. How do i do this?

item.title: How can i make npcs give skill cape
item.dc:creator: @Element_SoftwareTM Element SoftwareTM
item.description:
@Element_SoftwareTM wrote:

Oh alright, thanks mate[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2008, 06:49:35 PM[/size][hr]It worked, but now how do i set a diolouge for the players without a 99 stat, he will tell them you need a 99.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make npcs give skill cape

item.title: How can i make npcs give skill cape
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

g u n:

this is something new i dont think alot of people will know this…

People who have no idea what there doing in Java.

But really, this is REALLY easy to do.

Sec, I’ll work up a code.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2008, 06:32:44 PM[/size][hr] } else if (NPCID == YOURNPCIDHERE) { if(playerLevel[playerAttack] == 99) { addItem(skillcapeID, 1); } if(playerLevel[playerStrength] == 99) { addItem(skillcapeID, 1); //replace "skillcapeID" with the skill cape ID.. }

Put that in the first click npc packet. I’m not spoon feeding you the code, so you’ll have to do the rest. If you can’t figure it out from here go to a Java website.

Read full topic
